content:
Having an awesome time in Spain working on sequence wallet v3. The work is great. The food is amazing. The people are even better. 
I truly appreciate the opportunity and hospitality. Being able to spend days by the fire, chatting about AI philosophy and hacking code is a life I want to live. Living the high life with asado, wagyu k bbq and other luxury cuts. It's the crypto millionaire lifestyle for sure. 
I miss the fam a lot and I'm excited to go home but damn am I going to miss this.
